markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Azarketi Lore](/Feats.aspx?ID=2670) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Absalom, City of Lost Omens](/Sources.aspx?ID=108) pg. 394, [Azarketi Ancestry Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=76) pg. 4</row>

</column>

---

You have learned the history and origins of your people and how to connect to both your land and sea heritage. You become trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) and [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10). If you would automatically become trained in one of those skills (from your background or class, for example), you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. You also become trained in [Azarketi Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8).
name: Azarketi Lore
